column1:
By watching this animation (http://openstaxcollege.org/l/foodgroups) you will see that for the various food
groups—proteins,fats,andcarbohydrates—digestionbeginsindifferentpartsofthedigestionsystem,thoughallend
inthesameplace.Ofthethreemajorfoodclasses(carbohydrates,fats,andproteins),whichisdigestedinthemouth,
the stomach, and the small intestine?
